Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-11234 affecting package qemu for versions less than 6.2.0-25
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-11234 affecting package qemu for versions less than 6.2.0-25. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package qemu is earlier than 6.2.0-25, affected by CVE-2025-11234
